name: Salem Witch Trials: You are Accused
name_original: Salem Witch Trials: You are Accused
description: You have been living a peaceful life in 17th Century Salem when suddenly you are accused of witchcraft. A guilty verdict means death, can you survive?  This game presents you with several different routes and choices in a witch trial, taking inspiration directly from how the witch trials actually progressed in Salem at the time of the infamous Witch Trials. Most routes and options lead to death or condemnation, as they did in real life. Can you defy the odds and escape the accusations?
